strings:
<voice_0x0100134E><se_def>*: Oh, dear sister!
You look so beautiful when you pray!
Too beautiful!
<voice_0x0100134F><se_def>*: Dear Goddess, what should a poor soul such as I do, now I have fallen for one of your flock?

<voice_0x01001350><se_def>Angelo: Confess! Even when you are racked with self<->doubt, have faith in Her divine benevolence.
The Goddess looks kindly upon those who
take action.

<voice_0x01001351><se_def>*: ...Was that...an angel!?
Oh! I understand!
I will do exactly as you say!
